Room.Name: East Hildor Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on East Hildor Lane, outside a famous fighting school.
Room.LongDescription: The building on the south side of the lane doesn't look any more imposing than the rest of the buildings in the neighborhood, and has a thatched roof just as they do. But a sign out front proclaims it to be Jerome's School for Fighters. Jerome no longer does the training, but leaves it to his three sons to accomplish under his supervision.
